Unequal Technologies, a small company in Kennett Square, Chester County, Michael Vick 's national( and international) star power remains one of the biggest question marks in the world of advertising and public relations. Overall, he probably still has a long way to go to get back in the good graces of the general consumer in terms of marketability, said Jim Klunk, president of Klunk& Millan Advertising Agency in Allentown. "I think he'll be pretty much limited to the types of products that[ Unequal Technologies] makes, at least right now.

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. "Just get your swagger back," Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. Reggie Jackson 's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night

"We definitely see a connection between all of this activity," says Stuart Schear, Vice President for communications for the Planned Parenthood Federation of America. These organizations are working very much together with the legislative agenda of defunding Planned Parenthood in mind. Planned Parenthood has had its funding threatened before.
